bibl.title: The Shrines of Hathor and Amenhotep in Western Thebes in the Ptolemaic Period.
bibl.note: In the archive of Totoes references to a temple of Hathor ""on the mountain"" and a temple of Hathor ""in the necropolis"" refer to the temple in Deir el-Medina. Deir el-Bahari housed a sanctuary of Amenhotep son of Hapu, while the localisation of another one remains uncertain. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Eddy Lanciers, The Shrines of Hathor and Amenhotep in Western Thebes in the Ptolemaic Period.

In the archive of Totoes references to a temple of Hathor ""on the mountain"" and a temple of Hathor ""in the necropolis"" refer to the temple in Deir el-Medina. Deir el-Bahari housed a sanctuary of Amenhotep son of Hapu, while the localisation of another one remains uncertain. - Avec résumé en anglais.
